attributes.action: The effect of increasing retirement age on life expectancy
attributes.additional_details: The Goverment undertake to research any link between increased retirement age and life expectancy, making the results known to interested parties (Public Sector Workers Unions) and the General Public.  The Government should in this process publish any calculations they have recieved/made on cash savings due to reduced life expectancy as a direct result of their proposed Pensions Age reforms
